title: 2 bedroom, Oversized walk-in closets, in Henderson NV
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '946', 'Address:', '2001 Ramrod Ave', 'South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Two-tone paint scheme Select units', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Onsite playground', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', 'Professional onsite management', 'Ceiling fans in dining room', 'Oversized walk-in closets', 'Separate dining area', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
